home.roomError: There is no game with this Room-ID

howto.headline: How to play
howto.text1: The game forms teams of 2 to 3 players. A team has to describe a certain word. The team's players take turns describing it word for word without discussing it beforehand. The other players try to guess the word. The faster the word is guessed, the more points the player gets.
howto.text2: If all players have guessed the word, or the round is up, it is the next team's turn.

cookie.text: We use cookies to make your experience better.

lobby.invite: Invite your friends with the following link:
lobby.teamError: The game is not playable with this team setup. Please change teams
lobby.changeTeam: Change your team by clicking on your avatar.

game.wasNear: That was close! The searched word is similar.
game.moreplayers: more player(s) to start the game
game.nextTeam: be ready it is your turn next.
game.chooseWordInfo: Choose the word you want to explain
game.wordWillChooseInfo: The word for the next round is selected.
